mapper.insert: insert into post(postNo, cateNo, postTitle, postContent, regDate) values (seq_post_no.nextval, #{cateNo}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select rownum, a.postNo, a.cateNo, a.postTitle, a.postContent, a.regDate, b.userName from post a join (select c.cateNo,d.userName from category c join users d on c.id = d.id) b on a.cateNo = b.cateNo where rownum = 1 order by a.cateNo desc
